spells.name: Fireball
spells.description: Hurls a ball of fire at the target, causing moderate fire damage.

spells.name: Healing Wave
spells.description: A wave of healing water that restores a moderate amount of health to an ally.

spells.name: Stone Skin
spells.description: Hardens the caster's skin, increasing armor for a short duration.

spells.name: Gust of Wind
spells.description: Creates a strong gust of wind that can push back enemies or clear obstacles.

spells.name: Radiant Bolt
spells.description: A bolt of pure light that sears the target, causing high radiant damage.

spells.name: Void Grasp
spells.description: Tendrils of void energy grasp the target, holding them in place for a short duration.

spells.name: Flame Cloak
spells.description: Surrounds the caster in a cloak of flames, damaging any enemy that comes into melee range.

spells.name: Ice Shard
spells.description: Launches a shard of ice that deals piercing cold damage.

spells.name: Earthquake
spells.description: Causes the ground to shake violently, damaging and knocking down all enemies in a large area.

spells.name: Teleport
spells.description: Instantly transports the caster to a nearby location.

spells.name: Holy Light
spells.description: A powerful healing spell that restores a large amount of health to a single ally.

spells.name: Life Drain
spells.description: Drains the life force from an enemy, damaging them and healing the caster.
